definition: abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

definition: Leonid Kravchuk (1934-), first post-communist president of Ukraine 1991-1994

sentences.english: Located on Clarendon Road in Central Watford.
sentences.chinese: 在位於中環的克拉倫登路沃特福德。

sentences.english: For Clarissa, the entree is just the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 對克拉麗莎來說，主菜只是是個開頭。

sentences.english: Watching from the boat, Mr Kirkconnell is sure Mr Clasen the right decision.
sentences.chinese: 事發時在船上的卡梅倫稱，克拉森作出了正確的決定。

sentences.english: Eight-year old Akram plays marbles with his friends in south of Kabul, capital of Afghanistan, in Nov. 2010.
sentences.chinese: 月，在阿富汗首都喀布爾，阿克拉姆與朋友們玩兒球。

sentences.english: I do not know why I've even come, " he commented to Krasus."
sentences.chinese: “我不知道我爲什麼會來，”他向克拉蘇斯提意見。

sentences.english: The boundary of the Amorites was from Scorpion Pass to Sela and beyond.
sentences.chinese: 亞摩利人的境界，是從亞克拉濱坡，從西拉而上。

sentences.english: It didn't take long for Zimmer to realize he had landed on a school of crappie.
sentences.chinese: 它沒有多久齊默實現他對學校的克拉皮降落。

sentences.english: I have no personal vendetta against Clarence Thomas.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有私人仇報克拉倫斯托馬斯。

sentences.english: See also Lewis and Clark Expedition.
sentences.chinese: 又見劉易斯和克拉克遠征。

sentences.english: Last week, the Clarks had lunch at a restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 上週，克拉克一家在餐館喫的午飯。

sentences.english: This is American Kraft cheese and crackers, sir.
sentences.chinese: 先生，這是美國克拉特乳酪和脆餅乾。

sentences.english: And a year later, The Language of Baklava was published.
sentences.chinese: 一年之後《巴克拉瓦的語言》問世。

sentences.english: I went there to meet Mr ClarksonRoger.
sentences.chinese: 我去那兒見克拉克森先生羅傑。

sentences.english: Mr. Clark is eligible for a fifteen percent discount because he is an employee of the company.
sentences.chinese: 因爲克拉克先生是這間公司的員工所以可以打八五折。

sentences.english: Syed Akram was 3 years experience in offline and online marketing.
sentences.chinese: 賽義德阿克拉姆是三年離線和在線營銷經驗。

sentences.english: Ever since Krajina was independent and separate entity from Croatia.
sentences.chinese: 自從克拉伊納是來自克羅地亞的獨立和單獨的實體。

definition: Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
zircon (colored crystal of zirconium silicate ZrSiO4)
Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
diamond/also called 鑽石|钻石[zuan4 shi2]
classifier for small spheres, pearls, corn grains, teeth, hearts, satellites etc

variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
